productname: Front Load Washer & Dryer set with Steam in Champagne
description: Laundry set includes a 4.5 Cu. ft. Front Load Washer with Steam in Champagne, 7.5 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize in Champagne. Energy Star Certified, ADA Compliant, Smart Care and more features.

productname: Bixby enabled Front Load Washer & Dryer set in Black Stainless Steel
description: Laundry set includes a Smart Front Load Washer with Super Speed in Black Stainless Steel, Smart Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize+ in Black Stainless Steel

productname: Top Load Washer & Dryer set with Active Water Jet and Sensor Dry in White
description: Laundry set includes a Top Load Washer with Active Water Jet in White, 7.4 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry in White.

productname: 18 cu. ft. Top Freezer Refrigerator with FlexZone™ and Ice Maker in Stainless Steel
description: The FlexZone™ compartment adjusts from refrigerator to freezer temperatures, while the Twin Cooling Plus™ technology helps keep produce fresher longer.

productname: 22 cu. ft. Family Hub™ Counter Depth 4-Door Flex™ Refrigerator in Black Stainless Steel
description: The Smart way to keep food and drinks fresh – our Family Hub™ feature lets you and your family leave notes, sync calendars, and display photos.

productname: 26.5 cu. ft. Large Capacity 3-Door French Door Refrigerator with Family Hub
description: Samsung’s 26.5 cu. ft. large capacity, 3-Door French Door Family Hub™ Refrigerator, is beautifully designed with a minimal dispenser and sleek-edge doors with modern handles.

productname: 25 cu. ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator with LED Lighting in White
description: With an extra-large capacity, this sleek refrigerator features high-efficiency LEDs which beautifully illuminate everything inside.

productname: 5.9 cu. ft. Freestanding Electric Range with Convection in Stainless Steel
description: Cook multiple dishes at once with a large capacity and bake and broil food faster and more evenly with Fan Convection.

productname: 5.8 cu. ft. Freestanding Gas Range with Flex Duo™ & Dual Door in Stainless Steel
description: This Flex Duo™ oven lets you cook two dishes at different temperatures, while the Dual Door allows you to access just the top oven or the full oven.

productname: 5.8 cu. ft. Slide-in Dual Fuel Range with Flex Duo™ & Dual Door in Stainless Steel
description: Boasting the best of both worlds, this range features a gas cooktop with an electric Flex Duo™ oven that can cook two dishes at different temperatures.

productname: Digital Touch Control 55 dBA Dishwasher in Stainless Steel
description: Digital touch controls let you easily select dishwashing functions, while an adjustable rack accommodates larger dishes.

productname: Linear Wash 39 dBA Dishwasher in Tuscan Stainless Steel
description: Our Linear Wash System combined with Whisper Quiet Cleaning brings remarkable cleaning results and a virtually silent performance to your kitchen.

productname: Over-the-Range Microwave with 1.7 cu. ft. Capacity in Stainless Steel
description: A stylish design for a seamless and modern look, this over-the-range microwave features large 1.7 cu. ft. capacity and a fingerprint resistant finish.

productname: 1.4 cu. ft. Countertop Microwave with Sensor Cooking
description: Designed with a scratch-resistant interior, this modern microwave features our Sensor Cooking options which conveniently provide optimal cooking results. in Fingerprint Resistant Black Stainless Steel

productname: 1.2 cu. ft. PowerGrill Duo™ Countertop Microwave with Power Convection
description: Our PowerGrill Duo™ technology crisps the outside of food without drying the inside, while the Power Convection cooks food quickly and evenly.
The convection oven and microwave combination features Slim Fry™ technology, which keeps food crisp on the outside and evenly cooked on the inside. In Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel
